title: Feature request: Add variables to Name field
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
1. Look at the help from menu Help | mRemoteNG Help. Check the "External Tools" option from left structured tree menu. There is section Variables like %HOSTNAME% that can be used with external tools Argument field.
2. In **Connection** panel create new connection.
3. In **Config** panel for this newly created connection inside **Display** section click on **Name** field. It would be awesome if variables could be used in this **Name** field like for example:
 `Mail server %Hostname%`

   Cur...
